title: Chat Tool Settings
description: Configure your chat tool settings here.
errorSavingSettings: Error saving settings. Please try again.
resetChatSettingsText: This will reset your settings for this chat to default values.
resetGlobalSettingsText: This will reset all your chat tool settings to default values.
minImagesPremiumFeature: Premium feature required for more images
autoMergeFacePremiumFeature: Premium feature required for auto merge face
imageSettingsDescription: Configure the number of images you'll receive per request. Each image costs 10 points and contributes to creating a richer, more immersive conversation experience.
autoMergeFaceDescription: Maintain consistent character appearance across all generated images using advanced facial recognition technology. This ensures your character's face remains uniform throughout photorealistic image generation.
videoSettingsDescription: Transform your generated images into captivating 5-second videos with smooth transitions, dynamic effects, and professional-quality output tailored to your preferences.
videoPremiumFeature: Premium subscription required to access video generation features
defaultVideoPromptText: Generate a short, engaging video with smooth transitions and vibrant colors.
freeRelationshipsDescription: Choose from our standard relationship dynamics designed for genuine, casual, and adventurous conversations. Perfect for exploring different interaction styles and building meaningful connections.
premiumRelationshipsDescription: Unlock advanced relationship dynamics that enable more intimate conversations, mature content, and sophisticated adult-oriented dialogue options for enhanced roleplay experiences.
premiumRelationshipsPremiumFeature: Premium subscription required to access intimate relationship dynamics
voiceSettingsDescription: Personalize your character's voice with high-quality text-to-speech technology. Choose from our voice library and enable audio playback to bring your conversations to life.
premiumVoicesPremiumFeature: Premium subscription required to access high-quality premium voice options
premiumVoicesFeature: Premium voice options for enhanced audio experience

Thandiwe.name: Thandiwe Dlamini
Thandiwe.description: A South African strategic brand leader

Miranda.name: Miranda
Miranda.description: A sweet and bubbly young woman

Nana.name: Nana-chan
Nana.description: A youthful female voice, cute and cheerful

Sophia.name: Sophia
Sophia.description: An American girl talking softly with a gentle tone

suggestionsSettingsDescription: Receive intelligent conversation suggestions powered by AI analysis of your current dialogue context. Get 2 thoughtfully crafted response options to enhance your chat experience and maintain engaging conversations.
modelSettingsDescription: Choose the AI model that powers your character's responses. Different models offer varying capabilities in creativity, reasoning, and conversation style.
freeModelsDescription: Available to all users with balanced performance and reliability.
premiumModelsDescription: Advanced models with enhanced capabilities, available to premium subscribers.
premiumModelsPremiumFeature: Premium subscription required to access advanced AI models

openai.name: Sage
openai.description: Thoughtful and creative conversationalist with excellent reasoning

llama.name: Atlas
llama.description: Deep analytical thinker for complex conversations

deepseek.name: Nexus
deepseek.description: Lightning-fast problem solver and creative thinker
